backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining roles, user profiles, customer records, authorization helpers, and profile‑based access checks with state stored in maps and sets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files across onboarding, dashboards, routing, styling, and report generation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying base UI styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing and bootstrap controller handling identity, profile fetching, deterministic timeout recovery, onboarding redirects, and authenticated app shell rendering.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Responsive app layout with header, navigation, notifications, and logout logic, wrapping routed dashboard and reports pages.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapRec: Displays a timeout screen with retry and session-clear options when app bootstrap takes too long.
frontend/src/components/AuthProfileLoadE: Shows a detailed profile load error with retry and logout options, including sanitized messages.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsBel: Renders a notifications popover with a mock unread counter and list display.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding constants such as app name, tagline, and location.
frontend/src/features/reports/pdfGenerat: Generates an HTML-based PDF report, embedding logo, branding, and tabular report data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller’s user profile, role, and admin status with detailed loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, clear, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation hook to save the caller’s user profile with success and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app's color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Shows admin stats and mock data tables for customers, deliveries, messages, and requests.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/CustomerDa: Provides customer stats, delivery history, and forms for bottle requests and support messages.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/SalesmanDa: Shows salesman stats, recent deliveries, and a form to record delivery activity with mock data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login UI and routes users to onboarding or their role-specific dashboard after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/AdminOnboa: Admin onboarding form that saves the user's profile with admin role and redirects to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerOn: Customer onboarding page allowing name and optional address entry, saving a customer profile and navigating to the customer dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/RoleSelect: Role selection flow where users enter their name, choose a role, save their profile, and are routed to the matching dashboard with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SalesmanOn: Salesman onboarding form that creates a salesman profile and redirects to the salesman dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays available reports and generates mock PDF reports based on user role.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting AED currency amounts and bottle rates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, rebranding goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions. Indicates the project is in a fix-request state with multiple blocked authentication and deployment flows.
